altTitles.ja: 鴨乃橋ロンの禁断推理

altTitles.es: El misterio prohibido de Ron Kamonohashi

altTitles.th: สืบลับฉบับคาโมโนะฮาชิ รอน

description.en: This unusual duo brings the hidden truth into the light! Ron Kamonohashi, a private investigator with serious issues, and Totomaru Ishiki, a pure-hearted but dim police detective, team up to solve the most baffling mysteries!
description.es: ¡Esta pareja de detectives formada por Ron Kamonohashi, un investigador poco ortodoxo, e Isshiki Totomaru, un policía de carácter puro e inocente, deberá resolver el misterio para sacar a la luz una verdad que lleva mucho tiempo enterrada bajo una terrible oscuridad! ¡De la mano de la autora de Katekyo Hitman Reborn y Éldlive llega esta vertiginosa historia de misterios y detectives!
description.ja: かつて、探偵養成学校BLUEで、解けない謎はない天才と呼ばれ、自らも類稀なる才能を生涯探偵に捧げると宣言した男・鴨乃橋ロン……しかしロンは探偵として致命的な欠陥をかかえていた!!　事件解決率100％！　犯人検挙率0％!?　訳あり探偵・鴨乃橋ロンがピュアでマヌケな捜査一課の刑事・一色都々丸と鮮烈に謎を解き明かす！
description.ru: Этот необычный дуэт раскроет все тайны! Рон Камонохаши, частный детектив с серьёзными проблемами, и Тотомару Ишики, чистосердечный, но глуповатый детектив полиции, объединяются, чтобы разгадать самые сложные тайны! Захватывающий детектив нового поколения от Акиры Амано, создателя "REBORN" и "ēlDLIVE"!!
description.pt-br: Essa dupla inusitada trará a verdade escondida para a luz! Ron Kamonohashi, um investigador privado com sérios problemas, e Totomaru Isshiki, um policial de caráter puro e inocente, se juntam para resolver os mistérios mais enigmáticos possível! Uma emocionante historia de detetive de uma nova geração de Akira Amano, criadora de “Reborn!” e “ēlDLIVE”!

title.en: The Most Beautiful Girl in the School is in Love With Me, the xx Artist!?

altTitles.ja: 学園1の美少女は××絵師の俺に惚れている！？

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen 1 no Bishōjo wa ×× Eshi no Ore ni Horeteiru!?
Gakuen 1 no Bishoujo wa ×× Eshi no Ore ni Horeteiru!?

altTitles.id: Gadis Nomor 1 di Sekolah Sekaligus Pembuat Karya XXX Jatuh Cinta Denganku?!

altTitles.en: The Number 1 Beautiful Girl in the School is in Love With Me, the xx Artist!?

description.en:
Amesaka Sora, an ordinary high school boy, usually enjoys drawing erotic pictures as a hobby. Since his failure in junior high school, he had planned to hide his hobby in high school... But one day, the student council president and the most beautiful girl in the school, Kisaragi Uguisu, finds out his secret...!?

A coming-of-age rom-com between a beautiful girl at the top of the caste system and one of those male extras!
description.id: Amesaka Sora, seorang siswa biasa yang suka menggambar hal-hal cabul. Karena kegagalannya di SMP, dia menyembunyikan hobinya ini di SMA. Namun, suatu hari, ketua OSIS sekaligus gadis tercantik sepenjuru sekolah, Kisaragi Uguisu mengetahui hobi rahasianya tersebut. Apa yang akan terjadi di antara mereka berdua?

altTitles.zh: 领主大人的金币用不完

altTitles.en: Does The Lord's Coin Not Shrink?!

altTitles.th: คอยน์เจ้าเมืองไม่ลดลงเลย?!

altTitles.ja: 領主様のコインは減らない!?

altTitles.es-la: El Dinero Del Señor No Disminuye

description.en: Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?
description.fr: Après avoir perdu toute la fortune de sa famille, un jeune seigneur devient la risée de tous. Pire encore, il tombe dans les mains de son pire ennemi et meurt des tortures qu'on lui a infligées. Au moment il perd connaissance, il se met à regretter toutes les erreurs qu’il a commises et qui l’ont conduite là où il en est… Et là, miracle ! Il se réveille 17 ans en arrière ! Son objectif : faire les bons choix, faire prospérer sa famille et surtout sa richesse et ce, grâce à l’aide d’un artefact magique, le livre de transactions interdimensionnelles !
description.ja:
誇り高きスティルガード家に生まれるも実力不足のまま領主になり、詐欺にあい全ての財産を失ってしまったエルン。暗殺者に死に追いやられるも気がつくと17年前に戻っていた！ 別の次元に住む者と物の取引が可能な家宝「次元取引書」 今度の人生ではなぜか自分の目に映るウィンドウで次元取引ができるようになっていた！？ 「同じ悲劇は繰り返さない」 前世での失敗をもとに怒涛の復讐劇をくり広げていく！

เอิร์น สตีลการ์ด ชายหนุ่มที่ต้องพบเจอโศกนาฏกรรมอันน่าเศร้าในวัย 33 ปีจากการถูกหลอกลวงและหักหลัง ได้ย้อนเวลากลับไปยังตอนที่มีอายุเพียง 16 ปี ด้วยความน่าอัศจรรย์ของไอเทมที่ซื้อมาจากการเทรดข้ามมิติ

เขาจึงตั้งปณิธานว่าในชีวิตนี้จะไม่ยอมให้เกิดเรื่องแบบเดิมขึ้นอีก และเขาจะใช้การเทรดข้ามมิติที่มีคอยน์เป็นตัวชี้วัด สร้างอนาคตอันรุ่งโรจน์ให้ได้!
description.zh: 废柴领主艾伦没钱没能力，唯一的武器就是一本书——次元交易书。 在即将被人残忍杀害之际，他凭借“愿望书签”实现了临终愿望，重生回到了过去，而此时的他发现，次元交易书出现在了他意想不到的地方……

title.en: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get it

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 藤丸立香はわからない

altTitles.fr: Fate/Grand Order : Ritsuka Fujimaru n’a rien pigé

description.en: Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!

Kang Yesol, who was transferred to the region of his alma mater, meets Jeong Hanlim, the owner of a bar named Splitter.

Yesol, who had been drinking heavily at the bar, wakes up the next morning at Hanlim's house and runs away in shock upon realizing that he slept with a man.

After realizing he lost an important USB drive, Yesol had no choice but to return to Hanlim. There, he suddenly recognizes that Hanlim is a junior from the baseball team.

Yesol, who has completely forgotten his high school memories, does not think much of Hanlim, who is hostile toward him, but he gradually begins to recall the past that he had once forgotten.

"Sunbae, People like you should just die."

In order to understand the true power of Earth, the alien Xiguang goes undercover as a student on Earth. He mistakenly believes that the science-fiction themed comics and movies on Earth are a display of Earthlings' ability to simulate interstellar wars, so he resolutely joins the school's anime club. Due to the cultural gap between aliens and Earthlings, a series of hilarious events unfold... Xiguang's seemingly humiliating but actually ridiculous undercover life is about to begin! So, Stay tuned….

altTitles.ja: 9つの不思議な世界

description.en:
Bored of Isekai? Reincarnation? You have come to the right place.

The Great War devours millions of lives. The children lost their parents, orphan are everywhere. Salvage is an institution funded by the government especially for orphans to become their country's heroes in the future. Akira Koshino is 14 years old boy orphan desiring revenge for his parent's death to accomplish his goal. During his journey, he encounters and makes friends, foes, and fantasy creatures.

title.en: Soshiki no Shukuteki to Kekkon Shitara Mecha Amai

altTitles.ja: 組織の宿敵と結婚したらめちゃ甘い

altTitles.en: It's so sweet when I marry my organization's nemesis

altTitles.vi: Thật Ngọt Ngào Khi Kết Hôn Với Kẻ Thù Của Tổ Chức Mình

altTitles.en: I Married My Organization’s Arch-Nemesis, and It’s So Sweet!

altTitles.pt-br: É Tão Doce Casar Com o Arqui-inimigo da Minha Organização

description.en:
"...I hate you!"
"What a coincidence. So do I."

　The two once belonged to opposing organisations of supernatural power users, and fought for their own opposing goals. Roushi Saikawa, also known as the "Feather Hunter," and Ritsuka Yanagi, the strongest supernatural power user known as the "White Demon." The two spent their days battling each other and had no normal social experience, but...

"I love you, Rou-kun."
"Me too, Ritsuka."

　After their organisation was disbanded, they somehow started dating and then got married! Is their hatred 100 times more adorable? Now, they are the epitome of a lovey-dovey couple, kissing each other at the door every morning when they go to work.

　But the husband had just one problem. That is, he had never shared a bed with his wife... In other words, even though he was married, he was still a virgin! This is the story of the hardships faced by such a husband, who gets caught up in numerous troubles but continues to make desperate attempts to deepen his love with his strict wife.
description.ja:
「……大っ嫌い！」
「奇遇だな。おれもだ」

　かつて敵対する異能力者の組織に属し、反目し合う目的のために抗争を繰り広げていた二人。
　《羽根狩り》の異名を持つ犀川狼士(さいがわろうし)と、《白魔》と呼ばれる最強の異能力者・柳良律花(なぎらりつか）。
　血で血を洗う毎日を過ごし、まともな社会経験のない二人だったが……

「ろうくん、大好きっ」
「俺もだよ、律花」

　組織解散後はなぜかイチャコラ付き合った上に結婚していた！
　憎さ余って可愛さ100倍？　いまや、毎朝会社に行く際に玄関で「いってらっしゃい」のチューをするくらいバカップルを地で行く夫婦。
　だが夫にはただひとつだけ悩みがあった。
　それは、妻と一度も寝床を共にしたことがないということ……要するに彼は既婚者なのにいまだ童貞であったのだ！
　これはそんな夫が数々のトラブルに巻き込まれながらも、
　身持ちのお堅い妻との愛を深めるため、今日も必死にアプローチを続ける艱難辛苦の物語である。
description.vi:
…. “ta ghét ngươi!”

“trùng hợp thay, tôi cũng vậy”

   Hai người họ từng thuộc hai tổ chức đối địch của những người sử dụng dị năng, và chiến đấu vì những mục đích trái ngược nhau.

       Saikawa Roushi, còn được gọi với cái tên là “thợ săn lông vũ”, và Yanagi Rikka, người sử dụng dị năng mạnh nhất được biết đến với cái tên “bạch ma”. Cả hai đã dành cả ngày để chiến đấu với nhau nên họ không có kinh nghiệm xã hội bình thường nào, thế nhưng…

 “em yêu anh, Rou-kun.”

“anh cũng yêu em. Rikka.”

  Sau khi tổ chức bị tan rã, bằng cách nào đó họ đã bắt đầu hẹn hò và đi đến kết hôn! Có phải sự thù hận của họ đáng yêu gấp 100 lần không? Giờ đây, họ là hình ảnh thu nhỏ của một cặp đôi yêu nhau say đắm, hôn nhau mỗi sáng trước khi đi ra ngoài.

  Nhưng người chồng có một vấn đề khá lớn, Đó là anh chưa bao giờ được ngủ chung giường với vợ mình… Nói cách khác, mặc dù đã kết hôn nhưng anh vẫn còn trinh! Đây là câu chuyện về những khó khăn mà người chồng phải đối mặt, dù vướng vào vô số rắc rối vẫn tiếp tục cố gắng để vun đắp tình yêu với người vợ nghiêm khắc của mình.
description.pt-br:
**Eu Te Odeio, Mas Também Te Amo**  

“...Eu te odeio!”  
“Que coincidência. Eu também.”  

Roushi Saikawa, conhecido como o "Caçador de Plumas", e Ritsuka Yanagi, a usuária de poderes sobrenaturais mais forte, apelidada de "Demônio Branco", pertenciam a organizações rivais que batalhavam por objetivos opostos. Durante anos, viveram enfrentando-se ferozmente, sem tempo para experiências sociais comuns.  

Mas agora…  

“Eu te amo, Rou-kun.”  
“Eu também, Ritsuka.”  

Depois que suas organizações foram desmanteladas, os dois, de alguma forma, começaram a namorar e acabaram se casando! Será que o ódio deles se tornou 100 vezes mais fofo? Hoje, eles são a personificação de um casal apaixonado, trocando beijos na porta todas as manhãs antes de irem trabalhar.  

No entanto, Roushi tinha um problema: ele nunca tinha dividido a cama com sua esposa. Em outras palavras, mesmo casado, ainda era virgem! Esta é a história das dificuldades de um marido dedicado, que enfrenta diversas confusões enquanto tenta desesperadamente fortalecer o amor com sua rígida e poderosa esposa.

altTitles.ja: サカモト デイズ カラー版

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!

description.en: Before Narumi Taiga, Bitou Tatsuya, King Joe and Tsukimoto Mitsumasa, there was Terakado Butta. This is the story of how, under his leadership, Housen became the powerhouse that would become Suzuran High School's greatest opponent. Butta was there the year the school was founded, and without him, we would have never had the Housen Hitman we know and fear today.

altTitles.en: Katarika: The Curse of Ghostly Tales

altTitles.ja: カタリカ ―語り禍―

description.en: The story of "Katarika: The Curse of Ghostly Tales" follows a group of girls trapped by a mysterious "curse" linked to Ghostly tales. It combines thrilling suspense and emotional depth, focusing on their friendships as they navigate this eerie phenomenon. The manga blends supernatural horror with the characters' personal struggles, unraveling a chilling tale of how stories can shape and destroy their world.

altTitles.th: จอมเวทไร้ขีดจำกัด

altTitles.ja: 無限の魔法使い

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

Dealing with three jobs daily.  
  
A mountain of stress and a pigsty to call home are the only things waiting for twenty-five-year old Jiun at the end of her work.  
  
Until one day, a stuffed doll finds her way into her arms — and with this, she's able to spoil herself with the housekeeping of Nam Doyoon, South Korea's top actor…?!

description.ja: 美人だけど学校一『カタブツ』だと噂の女子に勇気を出して告白すると…!?
description.pt-br: Embora ela seja bonita, há rumores de que ela é a garota certinha número um da escola. Então, quando criei coragem para confessar a ela...‽

description.en:
One day, a gate suddenly opened in the heavens, bringing with it the invasion of monsters and the intervention of monks in the human world.

『Miracle Drug “Coffee” Administration』

『Medicinal Contents: Caffeine and Sugar』
☞ Provides energy
☞ Stimulates the central nervous system
☞ Maximizes senses and reflexes

The whole world appeared to slow down, and Hanyul’s medications began to show their true effects.

title.en: City Where the Moon Does Not Rise

description.en:
Ha-jeong, a high school girl living an unfortunate life, has only a glimpse of the daily life of the influencer "Daldalrun."

Ha-jeong has an obsession level of affection for her and even hacked into the wall pad of her house and peeks at even her very private life. One day, while peeking into Daldalrun's room as usual.

Ha-jeong witnesses Daldalrun's death, and the next day, she finds herself possessed by her dead body....

altTitles.ja: イナズマイレブン

description.en:
Raimon Middle School 's soccer club captain, Endou Mamoru is in a pinch - his club is about to be destroyed! Literally! To avert the wrecking ball and disbanding of the club, his team must win against the toughest soccer team in the area - Teikoku. Will Endou and his team meet a crushing defeat or will a mysterious transfer student with a fiery kick save them from disaster?!  
  
Won the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Best Children's Manga.

altTitles.ja: テムパル〜アイテムの力〜

description.de:
Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.
description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
description.fa:
⁧⁧بزرگ‌ترین بازی واقعیت مجازی جهان «ستیسفای».  
⁧چه تو واقعیت و چه در دنیای مجازی شینگ وو کسی بود که همه‌ی بدبختی‌ها سرش می‌اومد.  
⁧اما تو میون این‌همه بدبختی‌، یه‌بار شانس بهش رو می‌کنه و تو یه مأموریت غیرممکن کتاب پاگما رو پیدا می‌کنه، کتابی افسانه‌ای که زندگی اون رو از این رو به اون رو می‌کنه.
description.fr:
Quand un joueur raté de VMMORPG tombe, lors d’une quête, sur un livre légendaire permettant de changer de classe, il en profite immédiatement. Attention joueurs, le plus grand de tous les forgerons est né ! Et il n‘a pas prévu de passer inaperçu !

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/overgeared)
description.id:
Shin Youngwoo punya kehidupan yang bernasib sial. Ia terpaksa bekerja kasar di sebuah tempat kontruksi untuk membayar biaya sekolah dan uang game yang ia gunakan. Bahkan ia juga kerja kasar di VR Game yang bernama Satisfy. Namun, hidupnya mulai berubah ketika karakternya sebagai 'Grid' di game menemukan 'Pagma's Rare Book' hingga menjadi legendary class player.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kekuatan-Item/3406)
description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/43170)
description.ko:
[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.
description.ru: В реальности, в играх, где бы он ни был, ему сопутствуют неудачи... Но в один момент всё меняется. В игре конце Северной пещеры он обнаружит квест, в котором найдёт "Редкую книгу Пагмы"... Ему удастся то, что не удалось сотням миллионов пользователей. - Как ты выжил? - Ничего особенного.
description.th:
ชินยองอู ID กริด ไม่ว่าจะในชีวิตจริงหรือในในโลกเกมเสมือนจริง SATISFY เขาก็เป็นตัวแทนแห่งความอับโชคไม่ต่างกัน...
แต่อยู่มาวันหนึ่ง กริด ได้พบกับตำราเปลี่ยนอาชีพที่นำเขาไปสู่การเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพระดับตำนาน 'ทายาทของแพ็กม่า'
อาชีพช่างตีเหล็กในตำนานที่จะทำให้เขาหลุดพ้นจากหนี้สิน พร้อมกับได้สัมผัส 'พลังแห่งไอเทม' และก้าวสู่การเป็นผู้เล่นที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Overgeared/43)
description.zh:
无论是现实世界还是游戏世界中，他都是最底层的存在！然而咸鱼翻身的机会终于来了！只要能够找到游戏中的最强装备，就能获得超20亿玩家中唯一一个成为传说中最强职业电竞选手的机会！他能否在假想现实游戏世界中创造新的传奇，成功脱离如同噩梦般的悲惨人生呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28630)
description.zh-hk:
[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

無論現實還是遊戲中，他都是個「不幸」的象徵...
在解任務時偶然發現
遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，
並轉職成20億玩家中，僅只一名的最強傳奇級職業。

「你怎麼還活著...?!」

「嗯...也沒什麼啦...」

「靠裝備囉。」

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

[已成功登入《SATISFY》。]

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%A3%9D%E5%82%99%E4%BB%94/47)

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill o Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

altTitles.es: Cada vez que me Expulsaban, Adquiría una Nueva Habilidad y Después de 100 Mundos Diferentes, Ya no Tengo Rival

altTitles.zh-hk: 每遭放逐就能獲得技能的我，在100個世界大開第二輪無雙

altTitles.zh: 每遭放逐就能获得技能的我，在100个世界大开第二轮无双

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.pt-br: Ganhei uma Nova Habilidade Toda Vez que Fui Exilado, e Após 100 Mundos Diferentes, Me tornei Imbativel

altTitles.vi: Nhận được một kỹ năng mới mỗi lần bị trục xuất, tôi trở nên bất bại sau 100 thế giới

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” 

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...
description.vi: Ed, một lính đánh thuê bình thường, đột nhiên được triệu hồi tới một nơi kì lạ và thực hiện thử thách "Bị trục xuất khỏi 100 tổ đội anh hùng ở 100 thế giới khác nhau". Cậu đã hoàn thành thử thách nhưng vẫn phải nhận thêm một nhiệm vụ "Hãy nhìn vào kết cục của một trong những thế giới mà cậu đã đi qua" và cậu đã bị sốc khi quay lại đó.
description.pt-br:
Um aventureiro chamado Ed foi expulso de sua equipe porque era considerado inútil, mas em vez de ficar triste e chateado, ele ficou feliz!!?

Acontece que não é sem razão que ele se sente feliz quando é expulso de uma equipe, porque toda vez que isso acontece, ele recebe uma habilidade que o torna ainda mais invencível...

Ed recebeu um teste maluco: ele teria que ser expulso de 100 equipes de Heróis em 100 mundos diferentes antes de poder voltar ao seu mundo original. Finalmente, uma entidade misteriosa e divina disse que ele havia cumprido todas as condições para retornar ao seu mundo original.

No entanto, como condição final, ele é desafiado: "Olhe o destino de um desses mundos de exílio depois que você partiu." E ele fica chocado com o que vê.

"Ok, eu vou fazer isso! Vou voltar para esses 100 mundos e ser banido com uma boa sensação!"

Ed assume um novo desafio: fazer pleno uso das superpoderosas "Habilidades de Exílio" que foram concedidas a cada vez que foi expulso, e desta vez garantir que todos tenham finais felizes.

title.en: Everyday Life with a Succubus Slave

altTitles.ja: サキュバス奴隷との日常

altTitles.en: Way to Be the Evil Emperor
I Shall Become the Evil God

altTitles.ja: スキルポイントが俺をレベルアップさせた

description.en: Among the various realms, is the manliest and most handsome evil god in history! The peerless and handsome Xie Yan crosses over and falls into the vixen's lair. In order not to be drained of his entire life-force, he travels between various realms, cuts down a son of god, and repels an invading union hailing from across the ocean… This is the story of how he eventually becomes an evil god.
description.pt: Por entre os vários reinos, encontra-se o deus maléfico mais masculino e atraente da história! O inigualável e bonito Xie Yan atravessa para outro mundo e cai no covil da víbora. Para não ser drenado de toda a sua força vital, este viaja entre vários reinos, chacina um filho de deus e repele uma união invasora vinda do outro lado do oceano… Esta é a história de como ele acaba por se tornar um deus maléfico.
description.zh: 纵横万界，史上最肉、最帅邪帝！ 绝世美男子谢焱一朝穿越掉进妖女窝，为了不被采补至死，穿梭诸天万界，斩位面之子，拒联邦洋夷……终成一代邪帝的故事。 周二。周五更新 不定时有加更福利~快去评论区催更吧~ QQ群：【我为邪帝】975576675

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn't make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl. Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her "The class's second cutest girl" behind her back. On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, "the cutest girl in class's" invitation just to hang out in my house with me. Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59139)
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.ja:
「じゃあ、内緒の友達ってことで――」

クラスでぼっちな俺・前原真樹に、初めてできた友だち・朝凪海。いつも輪の中心にいて、他の男子からは『クラスで２番目に可愛い』なんて陰で噂されている。ぼっちの俺なんかと住む世界が違う――と思いきや、まさかのＢ級映画好き!? ひょんなことから友だちになった朝凪さんは、金曜日の放課後だけこっそり俺の家に遊びに来る。映画にゲーム、漫画の趣味も合う彼女との楽しいひととき。
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.en: At Sakurazaka High School, students in class 1-A are involved in an unreasonable game called "The Friends-Eater Game", in which one of the conditions of the game is to eat specific parts of the bodies of their friends to survive. Cannibal school begins.

altTitles.ja: 源君物語

description.en: Minamoto-kun has a face pretty enough to make people think he's a girl. Because of his face, he was bullied by the girls in middle school who were jealous of his face. He developed a fear of women due to the trauma and ended up attending a high school for boys. Just as he enters college and makes a promise to himself to overcome the trauma of his past, his father remarries and asks him to move out of the house. His father arranges him to live with his aunt (Minamoto-kun's father's younger sister) for the time being. She is an extremely beautiful woman who is also a non-tenured professor at his college. When he arrives at her apartment, she shows him her breasts and tells him that he will be her "guinea pig" in her reverse Hikaru Genji project.
description.pt: Minamoto-kun tem um rosto bonito o suficiente para fazer as pessoas pensarem que ele é uma menina. Por causa de seu rosto, ele foi intimidado pelas meninas no ensino médio que estavam com ciúmes de seu rosto. Ele desenvolveu um medo de mulheres devido ao trauma e acabou frequentando uma escola para meninos. Justo quando ele entrar na faculdade e faz uma promessa a si mesmo de superar o trauma de seu passado, seu pai se casa novamente e pede para ele sair da casa. Seu pai arranja-lhe para viver com sua tia no momento. (irmã mais nova do pai do Minamoto-kun). Ela é uma mulher extremamente bonita, que também é professora adjunto em sua faculdade. Quando ele chega em seu apartamento, ela lhe mostra os seios e diz que ele será a sua "cobaia" em seu projeto Genji Hikari.
description.ru: Лицо Минамото-куна настолько прекрасно, что его легко спутать с девушкой. Из-за этого девушки в средней школе над ним часто издевались и дразнили. Тогда же он и получил серьёзную психологическую травму: боязнь представительниц противоположного пола. В результате всё закончилось переводом в школу для мальчиков. Сразу после поступления в колледж, он решает раз и навсегда избавится от детской травмы. Но тут его отец снова женится и просит сына съехать из дома и пожить с его младшей сестрой – тётей Минамото. Тётушка оказывается очаровательной женщиной, которая, к тому же, преподаёт в колледже Минамото-куна. Переехав к ней он узнаёт, что будет объектом её исследований. По мотивам классического японского романа «Повесть о Гэндзи».

description.en:
Possessing both flexibility and tenacity, Imomushi (Japanese for Caterpillar) is an assassin that does not kill anyone but those who are assigned to her. She seems to have had something happen between her and her older sister in the past, however.  
  
A new spin-off story from the same author of Arachnid, this story looks at the inner workings of a top assassin within The Organization itself.  
  
Note: In early 2014, serialization resumed with a new artist. The series had been on hiatus after the sudden passing of the previous artist in 2013

description.en:
Alice is a senior high school student who lives with an uncle that spends his time tormenting her everyday. One day, Alice witnesses the death of her uncle by the hands of an assassin called "Kumo" (Arachnid in Japanese). She then falls unconscious, and upon waking up, she finds out that she's in Kumo's house… Now, this Alice who no longer has any family is being raised by the assassin himself..!

description.ru: Элис - старшеклассница, которая живет с дядей, все время мучающим ее. Однажды Элис стала свидетелем смерти своего дяди от рук убийцы по прозвищу "Кумо" (по-японски Арахнид). Она теряет сознание, а после пробуждения узнает, что она находится в доме Кумо. И теперь Кумо воспитывает Элис.

description.en: While Asuna, Leafa, Silica and Lisbeth were doing their homework in Kirito and Asuna's Log House on the 22nd Floor of New Aincrad, Lisbeth informed Asuna of a player known as Absolute Sword who was challenging players on the 24th Floor, while offering an 11-hit Original Sword Skill as a reward. Asuna was told that the mysterious player had actually converted from a different game and that over thirty players who had attempted to challenge the player, including Leafa and even Kirito, were defeated. Hearing that Kirito had said something to the player before being defeated and not sharing what he had said with the others and thinking that the mysterious player had come for a reason, Asuna decided to challenge the player as well. To her surprise, the player was actually a girl, named Yuuki.
description.pt-br: A batalha de Kirito e Sinon contra Death Gun acaba, porém algumas semanas após o ocorrido, algo estranho anda acontecendo em Alfheim Online. Uma nova duelista com uma espada customizada está derrotando todos os jogadores do MMO, incluindo Kirito! Mas quando Asuna se encontra com esta duelista, ela recebe algo que nunca esperava: um convite para se juntar a uma guilda exclusiva! Mas quais são os objetivos deles? O arco Mother’s Rosario tem início!

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生者才能駕馭的極限天賦 —Over Limit Skill Holder—

description.en:
A fantasy adventure about bonds forged with people in a different world. The setting is a world, where everyone has eight skill slots. In these slots people can put skills like “Strengthen arm ★” and “Fire Magic★★” from skill orbs, abilities which prove extremely useful for survival. The total amount of stars your skills have can never exceed your slots. Our protagonist Reiji, worked as a slave that mines skill orbs, until 10 years old. Along with his precious older sister, Lark, they worked gruellingly in the mines until one day, where the chance for rebellion occurred at the mine and Reiji got his hands on a ten-star, a so called “overlimit” skill, called “World Ruler”. Reiji went from a powerless slave to having an ability that surpassed human limits, but in the chaos of the revolt, he was separated from the only person dear to him, his sister Lark.  
  
“To regain his bond with her, to make her his true sister”, earnestly thinking so, Reiji’s adventure to distant places starts!

description.ja:
"契約魔術"によって拘束され、鉱山で奴隷として働かされていた10歳の少年・レイジ。姉貴分の少女奴隷・ラルクと共に"天賦珠玉（スキルオーブ）"を採掘するだけの人生を送っていた彼は、鉱山で起こった暴動をきっかけに"あらゆる事象を一瞬で理解"し、さらには"他者のスキルをコピー"できるという最強の感知＆ラーニングスキル【森羅万象（ワールド・ルーラー）】を入手。同時に自身が元々17歳の高校生であり、事故死から蘇った異世界転生者であることを知った。

レイジはスキルの力を活かして鉱山を脱出するものの、たった一人の仲間だったラルクと決別してしまう。いつかラルクと再会し、本当の姉弟になることを胸に誓って――レイジの果てしない冒険が始まる!!

description.en:
By some sort of fate, exorcist Xiao Yu is forced to "cohabitate" with the succubus named Obsidian, who killed her adoptive father. Yet she discovers that the succubus seems to have lost her memories! Unaccepting of this fact, Xiao Yu decides to spy on Obsidian's every move, yet the latter doesn't seem bothered by the least. Instead, she starts to thirst after Xiao Yu openly and often teases her body to satiate her own hunger...

Although they seem to have a love-hate relationship, they both know that something is stirring beneath the depths. Why her adoptive father was killed, why Obsidian's memory was sealed away, and...

Cha Iseul is a girl who, without money, is like a lifeless body. She indulges in a depraved lifestyle.

But one day, her card is confiscated, and she faces the threat of being kicked out of the house. At that moment, a mysterious woman named Sori appears in front of Iseul. "Madam, do you really not remember me?"

description.en:
“I’m going to do this for the last time, so let me go back with my memories.”

Those who died for me 29 times... I wanted to protect you with my own hands at least once. I want to protect those poor and pitiful 'my people.'

Thus, Elysia's 30th and last regression began. Everything began to change as if fate had been twisted into place. A child who was born without a ‘sign’ in a family that received God’s protection and lived a harsh life. I gradually realize that the beginning of the curse disguised as God's blessing all started with one person...
description.fr: Élisia Creed est de retour dans son corps de 10 ans."Mais pourquoi à ce moment précis ?"La personne qui l'a sauvée, qui était presque la proie des chiens sauvages dans la forêt de minuit, est le duc Balne, le protagoniste de toutes sortes de rumeurs dangereuses.Elle a vécue 29 vies dans le malheur à cause de sa belle-mère, qui cherche désespérément à la tuer, et de son père froid et négligent. C'était la dernière chance que Dieu lui a donnée. Avec l'aide du duc, Élysia change son destin.
description.zh:
重生30次遇见危险公爵
这次要亲手改变不幸的命运
艾莉希雅·克雷德回来了！再一次回到了自己儿时的身体里。这倒不是坏事，可为什么偏偏回到了这个时间点啊？在午夜的森林里，有着各种危险传闻的瓦尔恩公爵，救了差点被一群野狗撕咬的她。因为绞尽脑汁想要夺走她的性命的继母，和对此冷眼旁观、放任不管的父亲，艾莉希雅过了29次悲惨的人生。这是神给予她的最后一次机会，这一次艾莉希雅在公爵的帮助之下，开始了改写自己命运的故事！

Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

description.en:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

And then there’s a group of lowlifes who are constantly coveting my wife. Who says a man marrying into his wife’s family can’t rise to greatness? Ji Xueyu! From now on, I’ll be the one to protect you

description.en: The manga's story begins when a peasant named Hanbē asks a girl named O-haru for her hand in marriage, but O-haru confesses that she is already thinking of another man named Masakichi from a neighboring village. When Hanbē seeks out Masakichi, he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it, despite being a peasant.
description.ru: Крестьянин по имени Ханбэй делает предложение руки и сердца девушке по имени Охару, однако она признаётся, что влюблена в другого парня, Масакити, живущего в соседней деревне. Когда Ханбэй отправляется на поиски Масакити, чтобы сразиться с ним, он обнаруживает, что тот умело обращается с мечом, несмотря на то, что он тоже крестьянин. Во время их схватки они слышат крик тонущей девочки, которая просит о помощи, после чего вдвоём бросаются на помощь, в процессе чего погибают в бурном потоке реки. После смерти оба парня оказываются в той самой, всем хорошо знакомой комнате.

description.en:
Alice had woken up in Room 431 of a mysterious manor.  
  
"You must not leave this room," warned the Serpent, but she paid it no heed and her body began to rot…  
  
Will she be able to escape the cursed manor?  
  
*Was nominated for the [2019 Japan Media Arts Festival Awards - Manga Category](http://archive.j-mediaarts.jp/en/festival/2019/manga/).*

Odasından çıkması ile beraber bedeni yavaşça çürümeye; Belkide malikaneye karışmaya başladı…

description.en: Billionaire Tono Ryuichi, the President of Tono Foods Group, a giant food company, recently acquired two young female assassins from the Mexican cartel. Sui and Ai came from unimaginably poor childhoods and was given a choice between killing people or selling their body. They chose the former and went through an inconceivably extreme training and, at 17 years old, they have become one of the deadliest assassins in the world. They are absolutely obedient to their master and they are given the task of finding the killer that poisoned Ryuichi's wife and child. They begin attending high school to blend into society and, at the same time, read and study which helps them become even more deadlier on the field. Sui and Ai encounter Matoba Imari who is a high school assassin herself and may be more skilled than both of them. But unlike the two, Imari just wants to lead a normal life. Whatever Imari wishes for her life is not their problem because the only thing Sui and Ai feeds on are bloodthirst and a challenge.
description.ja: 青年実業家の透野隆一は南米のマフィアから2人の美少女殺し屋を買い付ける。翠と藍と名付けられた彼女たちは透野の命令で、彼の妻子を殺した人間を狩ることに。だがその道行きで別の殺し屋女子たちと出会い、事態は思わぬ方向へ加速していくのだった…。青年実業家の透野隆一は南米のマフィアから2人の美少女殺し屋を買い付ける。翠と藍と名付けられた彼女たちは透野の命令で、彼の妻子を殺した人間を狩ることに。だがその道行きで別の殺し屋女子たちと出会い、事態は思わぬ方向へ加速していくのだった…。
description.vi: Tono Ryuichi, người đứng đầu Tono Foods Group, sở hữu trong tay một chuỗi các nhà hàng hạng sang đắt tiền tại Nhật Bản. Một ngày nọ, anh quyết định đến Mexico mua cho mình hai cô gái sát thủ trẻ được nuôi dưỡng bởi Mafia, với mục đích tìm cho ra kẻ đã hãm hại vợ và con của mình. Anh đặt tên cho cả hai là Sui (THÚY) và Ai (LAM). Sau khi chuyển đến Tokyo, Sui và Ai được Tono cho theo học tại một trường tư thục, nơi cả hai được thỏa thích đọc sách để nâng cao kiến thức để trau dồi thêm kỹ năng ám sát của mình. Tại đây, họ gặp được Matoba Imari, vốn cũng là sát thủ, thậm chí có phần còn giỏi hơn cả hai. Nhưng không giống họ, Imari chỉ muốn có một cuộc sống bình thường. Dẫu vậy, bất chấp mong muốn của Imari, những gì Sui và Ai quan tâm lại chỉ có mùi tanh của máu và những vụ săn giết thỏa mãn được bản tính ưa thách thức của họ.

altTitles.ja-ro: Tadayoedo Shizumazu, Saredo Naki mo Sezu

altTitles.ja: 囀る鳥は羽ばたかない

description.en: Yashiro is the young leader of Shinseikai and the president of the Shinseikai Enterprise, but like so many powerful men, he leads a double life as a deviant and a masochist. Chikara Doumeki comes to work as a bodyguard for him and, although Yashiro had decided that he would never lay a hand on his own men, he finds there's something about Doumeki that he can't resist. Yashiro makes advances toward Doumeki, but Doumeki has mysterious reasons for denying. Yashiro, who abuses his power just to abuse himself, and Doumeki, who faithfully obeys his every command, begin the tumultuous affair of two men with songs in their hearts and no wings to fly.

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合

title.en: Zatsuyo Gakari Ken Shien Jutsu Shi Ha Party Tsuiho Ni Akogareru ~Seken Ha Tsuiho Boomnanoni, Ore Wo Kadai Hyoka Suru Party Member Tachi Ga Kesshite Tebanaso to Shitekurenai~

altTitles.ja: 雑用係兼支援術師はパーティー追放に憧れる～世間は追放ブームなのに、俺を過大評価するパーティーメンバーたちが決して手放そうとしてくれない～

altTitles.en: The Support Mage Yearns for Party Banishment: The World Is in a Banishment Boom, but the Party Members Who Think Too Highly of Me Never Want to Let Me Go

altTitles.es: El Encargado de los Deberes y Mago de Apoyo Anhela ser Expulsado del Grupo ~Aunque el Mundo Está en un Boom de Expulsiones, los Miembros del Grupo que me Sobreestiman no me Dejarán ir~

description.en: "Stormbreaker," an up-and-coming party of young adventurers, is making waves in the dungeon conquest world with its record-breaking speed. Amidst this, Monog, who works as a handyman and a support mage, begins to doubt whether he will be expelled from "Stormbreaker" due to the recent "Attacker Supremacy" trend. However, the other members have no intention of kicking him out. In fact, they are the complete opposite...? Is the negative handyman actually a genius(?) support mage?
description.es: El grupo de aventureros jóvenes y prometedores 'Stormbreaker' está causando sensación al progresar en la conquista del calabozo a una velocidad récord. En medio de esto, Monogu, quien trabaja en tareas generales y también es un mago de apoyo, se siente cada vez más paranoico debido al actual 'atacante supremacista' que prevalece, temiendo ser expulsado de 'Stormbreaker'. Sin embargo, los miembros no tienen intenciones de expulsarlo, ¡y de hecho, algo totalmente opuesto...? ¡El despectivo asistente resulta ser un genio mago de apoyo! Junto a los miembros con personalidades únicas y adorables, ¡apuntemos a convertirnos en el grupo más fuerte! ¡Desde 'Novela Web', una historia de aventuras juveniles y harem!
description.ja: 新進気鋭の若手パーティー「ストームブレイカー」は、最速記録でダンジョン攻略を進める今話題の冒険者集団だ。そんな中、雑用係兼支援術師のモノグは昨今の「アタッカー至上主義」により、自身が「ストームブレイカー」から追放されるのでは？と疑心暗鬼に陥っていた。しかし、メンバーたちは追放しようとは思っておらず、それどころかまったくの真逆で…？ネガティブ雑用係は天才（？）支援術師だった！？

description.en: The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?
